_header: Who thee thus beset Jesu my sweet life
Note:
Cf. Walther (1969)
XWalther, Hans. Initia carmina ac versuum medii aevi posterioris latinorum. Göttingen, 1959; 2nd ed. 1969, no.16112.
_description: One couplet translating ‘Quis te lesit ita Iesu dulcissima vita…’ which precedes it in John Grimestone’s sermon notebook

NLS18721.Transcription:
Wo þe þus beseþ iesu my suete lifffor mannis soule to
                    biȝen les i þus mi lif
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 35.
